attributes.action: Make MLM (Multi Level Marketing) schemes Illegal in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
MLM’s prey on vulnerable people and can earn income by recruiting people. 97% of people in MLMs fail and don’t earn back what they have put into the company. The true customers in a MLM are the people who work for them as their products aren’t easily available for the public without signing up. 

Social media is used as a marketing tool and creates toxic positivity to lure people in whilst exaggerating the truth. There are more chances of being successful in a pyramid scheme than most MLMs.
attributes.background: Make MLM companies illegal in the uk, these companies are set up to fail people in the lower sections of the company and the products are used as a decoy to hide that the company has a pyramid scheme format.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329080
